text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: You can do anything, Just Believe.
author: Robin Sharma

text: If you want to be happy, Be.
author: Buddha

text: The best way to predicate the future is to create it.
author: Peter Druker

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lau Tzu

text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steven Jobs

text: Education is the Most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: You cannot believe in god until you believe in yourself.
author: Swami Vivekananda
